description: The entire African continent, Madagascar and some islands make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.
West & East Europe including all of Russia and the Central Asian countries. The group is defined by Gapmidner, to make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.
North, South & central America make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.
Asia as defined by Gapmidner, to make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.
